operations.summary: Retrieve information about all or a selection of entities

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A tag to filter

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: A CIK number

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: A ticker symbols

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

operations.summary: Retrieve the filings of a particular entity

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A tag to filter

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: A CIK number

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: A ticker symbol

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: aid
parameters.description: An Archive ID (a value of the xbrl28:Archive aspect)

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year focus of the filings to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period focus of the filings to retrieve (default: FY)

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

successMessages.message: Returns all filings for the given entity.

examples.title: Retrieve the filings of a specific entity
examples.description: Retrieve information about the filings of an entity identified by its CIK. Return the result as XML.

operations.summary: Retrieve a summary for all components of a given filing

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the entity

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag to filter entities

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year focus of the components to retrieve (default: ALL)

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period focus of the components to retrieve (default: ALL)

parameters.name: aid
parameters.description: The id of the filings for which to retrieve components

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: [Deprecated] The id of a particular component

parameters.name: networkIdentifier
parameters.description: The network identifier (=role) of a particular component

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of a particular component

parameters.name: disclosure
parameters.description: The disclosure to search for (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameters.name: reportElement
parameters.description: The name of the report element to search for (e.g. us-gaap:Goodwill)

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A search term to search in the labels of components (e.g. stock)

parameters.name: profile-name
parameters.description: Specifies which profile to use. The default depends on the underlying repository.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

successMessages.message: Returns all components for the given filing

examples.title: Retrieve information about all components of a filing
examples.description: Retrieve information about all components of a particular filing which is identified by its accession number. Return the result as JSON.

examples.title: Retrieve information about all components of COCA COLA's latest 10-K
examples.description: Retrieve information about all components of a particular filing which is identified by its accession number. Return the result as JSON.

apis.description: Retrieve a Fact Table for a Component

operations.summary: Retrieve the fact table for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: [Deprecated] The id of the component

parameters.name: aid
parameters.description: The accession number of the filing. This parameter needs to be used together with the disclosure parameter to identify a component.

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the entity

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A tag to filter

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: networkIdentifier
parameters.description: The network identifier (=role) of a particular component

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of a particular component

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year of the filing

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period of the filing

parameters.name: disclosure
parameters.description: The disclosure of the component (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A search term to search in the labels of components (e.g. stock)

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Whether or not to stamp facts for validity (default is false)

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

parameters.name: additional-rules
parameters.description: The name of a report from which to use rules in addition to the component's rules (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Whether human readable labels should be included for concepts in each fact. (default: false)

parameters.name: profile-name
parameters.description: Specifies which profile to use. The default depends on the underlying repository.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

successMessages.message: Return the fact table for the given component

examples.title: Fact Table as CSV
examples.description: Retrieve the fact table for a particular component. Return the result as CSV.

examples.title: Fact Table of Coca Cola's Q3/2013 Balance Sheet
examples.description: Retrieve the fact table for the Balance Sheet of Coca Cola filing identified with accession number 0000021344-13-000050. Return the result as XML.

apis.description: Retrieve a business-friendly Spreadsheet for a Component

operations.summary: Retrieve the business friendly Spreadsheet for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: [Deprecated] The id of the component

parameters.name: aid
parameters.description: The accession number of the filing. This parameter needs to be used together with the disclosure parameter to identify a component.

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the entity

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A tag to filter

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: networkIdentifier
parameters.description: The network identifier (=role) of a particular component

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of a particular component

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year of the filing

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period of the filing

parameters.name: disclosure
parameters.description: The disclosure of the component (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A search term to search in the labels of components (e.g. stock)

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Whether or not to stamp facts for validity (default is false)

parameters.name: eliminate
parameters.description: Whether  to eliminate empty rows/columns

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

parameters.name: additional-rules
parameters.description: The name of a report from which to use rules in addition to the component's rules (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameters.name: profile-name
parameters.description: Specifies which profile to use. The default depends on the underlying repository.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

successMessages.message: Return the fact table for the given component

examples.title: Fact Table as CSV
examples.description: Retrieve the fact table for a particular component. Return the result as CSV.

examples.title: Fact Table of Coca Cola's Q3/2013 Balance Sheet
examples.description: Retrieve the fact table for the Balance Sheet of Coca Cola filing identified with accession number 0000021344-13-000050. Return the result as XML.

apis.description: Retrieve a Model structure for a Component.

operations.summary: Retrieve the model structure for a given component. A component can be selected in three ways. (1) by component id (cid), (2) by accession number and disclosure (aid and disclosure), or (3) by CIK, fiscal year, fiscal period, and disclosure (cik, fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: [Deprecated] The id of the component

parameters.name: aid
parameters.description: The accession number of the filing. This parameter needs to be used together with the disclosure parameter to identify a component.

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The CIK of an entity. This parameter needs to be used together with the fiscalYear, fiscalPeriod, and disclosure parameters to identify a component.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the entity

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag to filter entities

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: networkIdentifier
parameters.description: The network identifier of a particular component

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year of the filing

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period of the filing

parameters.name: disclosure
parameters.description: The disclosure of the component (e.g. BalanceSheet)

parameters.name: token

apis.description: Retrieve a Fact Table for a Report

operations.summary: Retrieve the fact table for a given report. Filters can be overriden. Filters MUST be overriden if the report is not already filtering.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The CIK of the entity

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the entity

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag to filter entities

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY). Can select multiple.

parameters.name: fiscalPeriodType
parameters.description: The fiscal period type of the fact to retrieve (default: instant+YTD). Can select multiple.

parameters.name: report
parameters.description: The name of the report to be used (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Validate and stamp facts accordingly

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Whether human readable labels should be included for concepts in each fact. (default: false)

parameters.name: profile-name
parameters.description: Specifies which profile to use. The default depends on the underlying repository.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

successMessages.message: Return the fact table for the given component

examples.title: Fact Table for the Fundamental Accounting Concepts of COCA COLA's 2010..2013 10-K filings as CSV.
examples.description: Retrieve the fact table for a particular component. Return the result as CSV.

apis.description: Retrieve a business-friendly spreadsheet for a Report

operations.summary: Retrieve the business-friendly spreadsheet for a report. Filters can be overriden. Filters MUST be overriden if the report is not already filtering.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The CIK of the entity

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the entity

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag to filter entities

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY)

parameters.name: fiscalPeriodType
parameters.description: The fiscal period type of the fact to retrieve (default: instant+YTD). Can select multiple, but preferably not both YTD and QTD.

parameters.name: report
parameters.description: The name of the report to be used (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameters.name: eliminate
parameters.description: Wwether to eliminate empty rows/colummns

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Validate and stamp facts accordingly

parameters.name: profile-name
parameters.description: Specifies which profile to use. The default depends on the underlying repository.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

successMessages.message: Return the spreadsheet for the given report

examples.title: Spreadsheet for the Fundamental Accounting Concepts of COCA COLA's FY 2010..2013.
examples.description: Retrieve the spreadsheet for a particular report. Return the result as JSON, with eliminated empty rows/columns.

operations.summary: Retrieve one or more facts for a combination of filings.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The CIK of the entity

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker of the entity

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag to filter entities

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: aid
parameters.description: The id of the filing

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year of the fact to retrieve (default: LATEST)

parameters.name: concept
parameters.description: The name of the concept to retrieve the fact for (alternatively, a parameter with name xbrl:Concept can be used).

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period of the fact to retrieve (default: FY)

parameters.name: fiscalPeriodType
parameters.description: The fiscal period type of the fact to retrieve (default: instant+YTD). Can select multiple.

parameters.name: map
parameters.description: [Deprecated, use report] The concept map that should be used to resolve the concept (default: none)

parameters.name: rules
parameters.description: [Deprecated, use report] The rules that should be used to resolve the concept (default: none)

parameters.name: report
parameters.description: The report to use as a context to retrieve the facts. In particular, concept maps and rules found in this report will be used. (default: none)

parameters.name: additional-rules
parameters.description: The name of a report from which to use rules in addition to a report's rules (e.g. FundamentalAccountingConcepts)

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Whether human readable labels should be included for concepts in each fact. (default: false)

parameters.name: profile-name
parameters.description: Specifies which profile to use. The default depends on the underlying repository.

parameters.name: prefix:dimension
parameters.description: The name of a dimension used for filtering. Accepted format: prefix:dimension. As a value, the value of the dimension or ALL can be provided if all facts with this dimension should be retrieved

parameters.name: prefix:dimension::default
parameters.description: The default value of the dimension [prefix:dimension] that should be returned if the dimension was not provided explicitly for a fact. Accepted format: prefix:dimension::default

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

responseMessages.message: Bad request: a parameter is missing or invalid or total is used together with csv or excel serialization
Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

examples.title: Retrieve us-gaap:Assets for DOW30
examples.description: Retrieve the value of us-gaap:Assets for all DOW30 entities for the latest reported year. Bring in all data regardless of which characteristic. Return the result as JSON.

examples.title: Retrieve us-gaap:Assets for DOW30 which relates to the root reporting entity only.
examples.description: Retrieve the value of us-gaap:Assets for all DOW30 entities for the latest reported year which relates to the root reporting entity only. Return the result as JSON.

examples.title: Retrieve fac:NetCashFlow for DOW30
examples.description: Retrieve the value of fac:NetCashFlow (using the FundamentalAccountingConcepts map) for the DOW30 entities for the year 2011. Return the result as CSV.

examples.title: Get text by company name/ID, period and element name
examples.description: Get text by company name/ID, period and element name.

operations.summary: Retrieve the report elements contained in a set of filings.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The result format

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A tag to filter entities

parameters.name: eid
parameters.description: An Entity ID (a value of the xbrl:Entity aspect)

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: A CIK number

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: A ticker symbols

parameters.name: sic
parameters.description: The industry group

parameters.name: fiscalYear
parameters.description: The fiscal year focus of the component to retrieve (default: ALL)

parameters.name: fiscalPeriod
parameters.description: The fiscal period focus of the component to retrieve (default: FY)

parameters.name: aid
parameters.description: The id of the filing

parameters.name: onlyNames
parameters.description: Whether only the names of the report elements should be returned. If so, the values don't contain duplicates. (default: false)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the report element to return (e.g. us-gaap:Assets).

parameters.name: map
parameters.description: [Deprecated, use report] The concept map that should be used to resolve the concept (default: none)

parameters.name: report
parameters.description: The report to use as a context to retrieve the report elements. In particular, concept maps found in this report will be used. (default: none)

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A search term to search in the labels of report elements (e.g. stock)

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the current session

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type of the request.

responseMessages.message: Unauthorized: the specified project token is invalid, expired, or has insufficient privileges
An internal error occurred during the processing of the request.

successMessages.message: Returns all names of the report elements in the selected filings.

examples.title: Retrieve the the names of all report elements of COCA COLA's latest FY filing
examples.description: Retrieve a set of names of report elements of COCA COLA's latest FY filing.  Return the result as CSV.

examples.title: Get element name of standard taxonomy by label
examples.description: Get element name of standard taxonomy by label.

examples.title: Get element name of specified company's taxonomy by label and company ID
examples.description: Get element name of specified company's taxonomy by label and company ID.

examples.title: Get label of standard taxonomy by element name
examples.description: Get label of standard taxonomy by element name.

examples.title: Get label of specified company's taxonomy by element name and company ID
examples.description: Get label of specified company's taxonomy by element name and company ID.

success.description: Whether the requests succeeded or failed.
